============================
SQLAlchemy inspection tools
============================

Provide tools for sqlalchemy models :

* inspection
* export (csv, excel, py3o context)
* import

requires:

openpyxl
py3o
colanderalchemy
SQLAlchemy

Documentation
--------------

Documentation is now available on readthedocs.org

http://sqla-inspect.readthedocs.org/en/latest/
